Uses of Package
org.springframework.beans.factory.support

Packages that use org.springframework.beans.factory.support
org.springframework.beans.factory.support Classes supporting the org.springframework.beans.factory package.  
org.springframework.beans.factory.xml Contains an abstract XML-based BeanFactory implementation, including a standard "spring-beans" DTD.  
org.springframework.context.support Classes supporting the org.springframework.context package, such as abstract base classes for ApplicationContext implementations and a MessageSource implementation. 
org.springframework.ejb.support Superclasses to make implementing EJBs simpler and less error-prone, as well as guaranteeing a Spring BeanFactory is available to EJBs.  
 

Classes in org.springframework.beans.factory.support used by org.springframework.beans.factory.support
AbstractBeanDefinition
          Internal BeanFactory implementation class.
AbstractBeanFactory
          Abstract superclass that makes implementing a BeanFactory very easy.
BeanFactoryBootstrap
          One singleton to rule them all
BootstrapException
           
RootBeanDefinition
          Root bean definitions have a class and properties.
 

Classes in org.springframework.beans.factory.support used by org.springframework.beans.factory.xml
AbstractBeanFactory
          Abstract superclass that makes implementing a BeanFactory very easy.
ListableBeanFactoryImpl
          Concrete implementation of ListableBeanFactory.
 

Classes in org.springframework.beans.factory.support used by org.springframework.context.support
ListableBeanFactoryImpl
          Concrete implementation of ListableBeanFactory.
 

Classes in org.springframework.beans.factory.support used by org.springframework.ejb.support
BeanFactoryLoader
          Interface to be implemented by objects that can load BeanFactories (usually on behalf of application components such as EJBs).
BootstrapException
